properties.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 24 at 3:27AM EST until January 25 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level
possible in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline.

* WHERE...Southern Nassau County.

* WHEN...Saturday morning.

* IMPACTS...Widespread flooding of vulnerable areas is possible
near the waterfront and shoreline, including roads, parking
lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near
the waterfront.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Minor coastal flooding is possible during
the evening high tide cycle.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT SATURDAY MORNING
